fixed_skill.desc: Deal Psychokinesis damage to all foes equal to 74.0%/77.7%/81.4% of Attack. Decrease foes' Defense by 10.0%/10.5%/11.0% for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Psychokinetic Disruption

innate_skill.desc: Deal Psy damage to all foes equal to 61.4/63.4/65.4% of Attack. Deal a Technical and increase damage by 35% for foes with a spiritual ailment.
innate_skill.name: Mapsi

innate_skill.desc: Decrease 1 foe's Defense by 38.8%/40.7%/42.7% for 3 turns.
innate_skill.name: Rakunda

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 8.3%. When attacking a foe with decreased Defense with a skill, deal bonus Psychokinesis damage equal to 38% of Attack 1 time.
passive_skill.name: Lovers' Duet

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 8.3%. When attacking a foe with decreased Defense with a skill, deal bonus Psychokinesis damage equal to 42% of Attack 1 time.
passive_skill.name: Lovers' Duet I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Psychokinesis damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
